$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.
The properties that define the artifact source.

___artifactRoot.description: The path from the location that the 'authentication' property [say, a SAS URI to the blob container] refers to, to the location of the artifacts. This can be used to differentiate different versions of the artifacts. Or, different types of artifacts like binaries or templates. The location referenced by the authentication property concatenated with this optional artifactRoot path forms the artifact source location where the artifacts are expected to be found.

___authentication.description: Defines the authentication method and properties to access the artifacts.

___sourceType.description: The type of artifact source used.
